Pre-Game Insights: The Tampa Bay Rays are coming off a series loss to the Philadelphia Phillies, where they were swept 2-1, 9-4, and 3-2.
In their last game, the Rays jumped out to a three-run lead against Cleveland and held on for a 3-1 win.
The Cleveland Guardians recently swept the Chicago White Sox, winning 5-3, 5-0, and 6-4.
Joey Cantillo will start for Cleveland with a 1-3 record and a 5.96 ERA over six games.
Drew Rasmussen will start for Tampa Bay with a 0-1 record and a 2.79 ERA over 11 games.
Eight of the last nine games between the Rays and Guardians at Progressive Field have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Twelve of the Rays' last 14 night games against American League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
